_source: speak;Emma; Why do people who do nothing but kill,{w} torture, and steal think they're doing the right thing?
speak;Caroline; The world is just full of bad people.{w} You can't talk or reason with them.{w} Some of us are just{tgm}...{tgm}born bad.
speak;Emma; Nobody is born evil!{w} Nobody is born a killer!
speak;Caroline; Does it make any difference how they wre born when it's you or them?
speak;Caroline; You didn't seem to care about those bandits when you{tgm}...{tgm}{w} promised to exterminate them, right?
speak;Caroline; I'm{tgm}...{tgm}going to go help finish the tents.{w} Could you help too?
speak;Emma; I just{tgm}...{tgm}need some time to think.
speak;Emma; I can't believe she would say that{tgm}...{tgm}{w} People can't be natrually bad.{w} Everyone can help.{w} Everyone can{tgm}...
